title: Request Camera Equipment from Gear Closet
description: A video journalist needs to check out a specific camera, lens, and microphone for an upcoming shoot.

tasks.description: Access the newsroom's equipment booking system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is logged into the booking system.

tasks.description: Check the availability of the required camera, lens, and microphone for the dates of the shoot.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the gear is available.

tasks.description: Reserve the equipment under their name for the specified dates.
